nav.githubDesc: opens my GitHub profile in a new window

hero.description1: I'm fascinated by code's ability to create great added value practically from nothing. I focus on Typescript, Node and React stack. On the frontend Next.js, Tailwind, Shadcn. On the backend PostgreSQL, Prisma or Directus.
hero.description2: I'm oriented towards professional growth - I like to learn a lot and I educate myself constantly. Besides running projects, I'm now taking a Coursera course with IBM as its guarantor and I have (maybe too many) books from O'Reilly open.

actions.projectsDesc: shows the projects and experience section
actions.contactDesc: goes to the contact section with information and form

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description: I'm a passionate developer with a love for innovation and problem-solving.

content.paragraph1: I'm a Frontend-heavy Full Stack Developer focusing on a technology stack based on TypeScript, Node.js and React (
content.skillsLinkDesc: goes to the skills and technologies section
content.paragraph2: I was introduced to IT by my brothers - both programmers from the beginning, and I decided to join them. I started with an intensive IT course from IT Network s.r.o. and continued with self-study using Coursera and O'Reilly books, but mainly through a series of larger and smaller projects.

actions.downloadCVDesc: downloads my resume in PDF format
actions.githubProfileDesc: opens my GitHub profile in a new window

officeAutomations.title: Office Automations
officeAutomations.description: Modern web application for automatic PDF processing of continuous waste records with AI integration.

interactiveComponent.title: Interactive Component for Laboratory Equipment Manufacturer
interactiveComponent.description: Dropshipping e-commerce solution with user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, payment processing and newsletters.

thisPresentation.title: This Presentation
thisPresentation.description: Modern and fast portfolio presentation built with Next.js, featuring 3D animations and accessibility-focused design.

nocodePWA.title: No-code PWA Generation
nocodePWA.description: Drag & drop PWA builder and generator.

dropshipping.title: Dropshipping E-commerce Solution
dropshipping.description: Dropshipping e-commerce solution with user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, payment processing and newsletters.

maps.title: Working with Maps
maps.description: App for displaying and working with maps - measuring distances, etc. Uses OpenStreetMap and OpenLayers.

form.title: Send Message
form.instructions: Contact form. All fields are required. Errors will be announced after attempting to submit.
form.emailHelp: Will be used to respond to your message
form.subject: Subject *
form.submitDesc: Submits the form after filling all required fields
form.sendingDesc: Form is being submitted, please wait
form.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. I will respond to you as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again or contact me directly.

help.message: At least 10 characters. Describe your project or requirements.

errors.nameLength: Name must have at least 2 characters

description.short: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience in IT. Specialization in TypeScript, React, Node.js. Portfolio, experience and contact information.
